SwitchPreference.android:title: SNI Check Bypass
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Bypasses common firewall censorship techniques found in some nations (like Russia)\nTry enabling this if you are unable to connect to Discord.

mods.preference.ProxyPreference.android:title: Custom Proxy
mods.preference.ProxyPreference.android:summary: Use your own HTTP proxy to connect to Discord

mods.preference.EmptyPreference.android:title: Bluecord made with love by Blue\nhttps://bluesmods.com
